about_the_game:
Eleven Sunrises is an open world exploration and survival RPG/TOWER DEFENSE. This game is developed by Full Ideas Games independent company.



You wake up in a desert environment with no memories. The burning ruins are the aftermath of a great battle of which you are the only survivor.
Why are you here ?
Are there any other survivors?

Explore vast post-apocalyptic world


Explore and conquer new territories. During this trip, you will find the food and weapons necessary for your survival.

Collect and use advanced bases to survive waves of enemies

Fear the light - Fear the night


A single energy, a single invincible enemy… the sun.
At nightfall, energy runs out and new predators appear.

How many sunrises will you survive?

Travel through different environments and unravel the mystery

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 2 cores / 4 threads @ 2.5Ghz ou équivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 4 cores / 4 threads @ 3.2Ghz ou équivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 Ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 2 cores / 4 threads @ 2.5Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Haswell 4 cores / 4 threads @ 3.2Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 Ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Eleven Sunrises

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Eleven Sunrises is an open world exploration and survival RPG/TOWER DEFENSE. Explore a vast post-apocalyptic world and survive waves of enemies.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
